labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: You get shown with a black and white profile picture and offline status when you click on your own profile
data.expected_result: You should show as online normally
data.short_description: In a Group DM, you show as offline while you're actually online
data.steps_to_repro: - Use the latest build please, was denied last time because people were using a version behind, ty - Create or join a Group DM - Set your status to DND or Online - Check the right member list
